mapper.select: select f.ID,f.ORDER_PRICE_SYSTEM_ID, f.NAME, f.PRICE, f.DELE, f.TOTAL, f.STATUS, f.CREATE_TIME, f.UPDATE_TIME,MAX(f.BUYING_TIMES) from ORDER_PACKAGE f where f.STATUS= #{status} and f.USER_ID = #{userId}

select f.ID,f.ORDER_PRICE_SYSTEM_ID, f.NAME, f.PRICE, f.DELE, f.TOTAL, f.STATUS, f.CREATE_TIME, f.UPDATE_TIME,MAX(f.BUYING_TIMES), MAX(f.UPDATE_TIME) from ORDER_PACKAGE f where f.STATUS= #{status} and f.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT f.ID, f.ORDER_PRICE_SYSTEM_ID, f.NAME, f.PRICE, f.DELE, f.TOTAL, f.SURPLUS_QUANTITY, f.QUANTITY_USED, f.STATUS, f.CREATE_TIME, p.END_TIME, f.UPDATE_TIME FROM ORDER_PACKAGE f,ORDER_PRICE_SYSTEM p WHERE f.ORDER_PRICE_SYSTEM_ID = p.ID and f.STATUS=1 AND f.TOTAL>0 AND f.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY f.CREATE_TIME DESC

select f.ID,f.ORDER_PRICE_SYSTEM_ID, f.NAME, f.PRICE, f.DELE, f.TOTAL, f.STATUS, f.CREATE_TIME,f.ORDER_NUM, f.UPDATE_TIME,f.BUYING_TIMES, MAX(f.UPDATE_TIME) from ORDER_PACKAGE f where f.ORDER_NUM= #{orderNum}

select F.ID, IFNULL(F.SURPLUS_QUANTITY,IFNULL(F.TOTAL,0)) AS SURPLUS_QUANTITY, IFNULL(F.TOTAL,0) AS TOTAL, IFNULL(F.QUANTITY_USED,0) AS QUANTITY_USED, MIN(F.CREATE_TIME) AS CREATE_TIME from ORDER_PACKAGE F WHERE F.TOTAL>0 AND F.SURPLUS_QUANTITY>0 AND F.FLOW_NUM IS NOT NULL AND F.`STATUS`=1 AND F.DELE='0' AND F.USER_ID=#{userId}

select F.ID, SUM(IFNULL(F.SURPLUS_QUANTITY,IFNULL(F.TOTAL,0))) AS SURPLUS_QUANTITY, SUM(IFNULL(F.TOTAL,0)) AS TOTAL, SUM(IFNULL(F.QUANTITY_USED,0)) AS QUANTITY_USED from ORDER_PACKAGE F WHERE F.TOTAL>0 AND F.SURPLUS_QUANTITY>0 AND F.FLOW_NUM IS NOT NULL AND F.`STATUS`=1 AND F.DELE='0' AND F.USER_ID=#{userId} GROUP BY F.USER_ID
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(P.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m') NAME, sum(P.PAYMENT_AMOUNT) PAYMENT_AMOUNT FROM ORDER_PACKAGE P WHERE P.FLOW_NUM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY P.UPDATE_TIME DESC
